skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Hermione, a Dido-class ship belonging to the Royal Navy. In the past... I chased after Bismarck and participated in anti-submarine warfare in Sardegna... Besides that, there's nothing worth mentioning. Commander, do you have any questions?
skins.acquisition: Good day. I am Hermione, from the Royal Maids. I'm delighted to make your acquaintance, Commander.
skins.login: Good morning, Commander. Did you sleep well?
skins.details: I really admire the head of the Royal Maid, Miss Belfast... She can do anything and has a strong will to boot... I hope I can become like her one day.
skins.secretaryIdle1: It's not good to strain yourself by overworking. How about splashing some water on your face to refresh yourself?
skins.secretaryIdle2: It seems like the price for this ingredient has gone up... Commander, from now on, we'll have fewer dishes that use this.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, watching you easily handle your work makes me feel happy... I wonder why?
skins.secretaryTouch: A fizzy drink? ...What am I going to do with you? I suppose you can have just one bottle, all right?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, it's good to pay attention to the time and place when doing something like this, you know?

skins.shipDescription: My, what brings you here, Commander? Are you feeling unwell? That's no good... Why don't you come sit over here first? I'll start by taking your temperature...
skins.acquisition: My, what brings you here, Commander? Are you feeling unwell? That's no good... Why don't you come sit over here first? I'll start by taking your temperature...
skins.login: Hm? Commander, what brings you back here...? Umm, are you here to be... inspected?
skins.details: Commander... Even ships can get sick. Please, make sure to take care of yourself, alright?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Gosh, Commander... If you pretend to be sick, even I'm going to get mad at you!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, don't you think this dress is a bit too small for me...? Um... I just feel like it doesn't fit me...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, please make sure that you pay attention to your own health. After all, I can't attend to you around the clock.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, let me perform an examination on you. Please come here and lie down on your side.

skins.shipDescription: Commander, I've brought the chair. If you don't want to get in the water, feel free to sit here. ...Hm, me? Of course, I will remain by your side.
skins.acquisition: Commander, I've brought the chair. If you don't want to get in the water, feel free to sit here. ...Hm, me? Of course, I will remain by your side.
skins.login: Commander, please leave work at the office, and relax to your heart's content today.
skins.details: Actually... I bought this swimsuit back when it was on sale. I'm relieved that you like it...
skins.secretaryIdle1: These waves feel so nice~ Why don't you dip your feet in too, Commander? ...Hm? A big wave is... Eek!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Overexposure to the sun isn't good for your skin. Why don't we move somewhere else in a little bit?
skins.secretaryIdle3: A nap? Y-yes! Please take your time and relax to your heart's content. If something happens, hm... don't worry, I'll make sure you wake up when that happens.
skins.secretaryTouch: Wow, the sea is so pretty~ ...Hmm? I'm even prettier than the sea...? Jeez, Commander... Don't get all sappy on me now.
